title.rendered: RBI may be better placed than Fed, ECB to pause on rates

content.rendered:
The Reserve Bank of India may be in a better position to pause on the interest rate increase cycle amid rising financial instability even as the Federal Reserve and the European Central Bank may continue to fight the inflation battle. While core inflation may remain sticky, the crash in Crude oil prices could help RBI dial down its inflation forecast by as much as 50 basis points to justify a pause.

Triggered by the uncertainty in the global banking sector, crude oil prices have crashed b ..
